sentences.sContent: Then I talk impersonally about the possible pulverization of our big cities, with a hundred million dead. I am unable to multiply one man’s suffering by a hundred million.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then I talk impersonally about the possible pulverization of our big cities, with a hundred million dead. I am unable to multiply one man’s suffering by a hundred million.
sentences.sCn: 但是如果我事不关己的谈论对我们城市可能造成的粉碎性攻击时，尽管它关乎数百万计的亡魂，我无法将我面对一个人痛苦的感情复制数百万倍。

words.tran: 研磨；使……成粉末；变成尘埃
